name: thames
content:

a river in the south of England that flows through London, Oxford, and some other towns

(also River Thames) the river that runs through London, starting in the Cotswolds (an area of southeast England) and ending in the North Sea: The ship sailed down the Thames and set off across the ocean. He went rowing one day on the River Thames.
More examplesFewer examplesNelson's body was taken up the Thames in a barge.The school moved to its current site by the Thames in west London in 1968.I cycled along the Thames to Festival Hall.They moved the theatre south across the River Thames, where it was rebuilt and renamed the Globe.
